5 Fraksi DPRD Gulirkan Interpelasi ke Gubernur Kaltim Isran Noor
05 Nov 2019, 22:49 by Danu Damarjati
Jakarta - DPRD Kalimantan Timur menggulirkan usulan penggunaan hak interpelasi terhadap Gubernur Isran Noor. Sebab, Isran Noor dinilai tak memfungsikan Sekretaris Daerah Provinsi yang telah ditunjuk negara.
"Sekarang kami sudah ajukan usulan interpelasi ke pimpinan Dewan," kata Ketua Fraksi PKB DPRD Kaltim, Syafruddin, kepada wartawan, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Dia menjelaskan latar belakangnya. Saat ini telah terbit Keputusan Presiden (Keppres) Nomor 133/TPA Tahun 2018 tentang penunjukan Abdullah Sani sebagai Sekretaris Daerah Provinsi Kaltim. Namun, menurutnya, Isran justru menunjuk M Sabani sebagai Plt Sekprov.
"Kami sedang menunggu tanggapan Dewan atas usulan penggunaan hak interpelasi DPRD Kaltim atas keputusan Gubernur yang tidak melaksanakan Kepres Nomor 133 Tahun 2018," kata Syafruddin.
Inisiator hak interpelasi ini adalah anggota Dewan Fraksi PDIP, PKB, Partai Golkar, PPP, dan PKS. Total jumlahnya 20 anggota DPRD.
"Terdiri dari 7 orang dari PDIP, 5 orang PKB, 4 orang Partai Golkar, 2 orang PPP, dan 2 orang PKS," kata Syafruddin.

5 DPRD Faction Launches Interpellation to East Kalimantan Governor Isran Noor
05 Nov 2019, 22:49 by Danu Damarjati
Jakarta - East Kalimantan Legislative Council (DPRD) rolled out the proposed use of interpellation rights to Governor Isran Noor. Because, Isran Noor is judged not to function the Provincial Secretary who has been appointed by the state.
"Now we have submitted the proposed interpellation to the leadership of the Council," said Chairman of the East Kalimantan DPRD PKB Faction, Syafruddin, told reporters on Tuesday (11/05/2019).
He explained his background. At this time, Presidential Decree (Keppres) No. 133 / TPA Year 2018 has been issued concerning the appointment of Abdullah Sani as Regional Secretary of East Kalimantan Province. However, according to him, Isran actually appointed M Sabani as Acting Secretary of the Province.
"We are waiting for the House's response to the proposed use of the East Kalimantan DPRD interpellation right to the Governor's decision not to implement Presidential Decree No. 133 of 2018," Syafruddin said.
These interpellation rights initiators are members of the PDIP Faction Council, PKB, the Golkar Party, PPP, and PKS. There are a total of 20 DPRD members.
"Consisting of 7 people from PDIP, 5 people from PKB, 4 from the Golkar Party, 2 from PPP, and 2 from PKS," said Syafruddin.
